description: Gravel texture with scattered gray stones and rocky variations

base_colors.note: Medium gray base colors with variation for natural stone appearance

primary_noise.note: Primary noise for rocky texture variation

dark_spots.description: Dark stone pieces and shadowed crevices

patterns.note: Regular dark spots for individual stones

light_specks.description: Lighter stone pieces and mineral highlights

color_adjustment.note: Lighter stone highlights and mineral flecks

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate primary noise: gravelX = sin(x * 0.8 + y * 0.3) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step2: Generate primary noise: gravelY = cos(x * 0.6 + y * 0.9) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply base colors: r = 130 + gravelNoise * 35, g = 125 + gravelNoise * 30, b = 120 + gravelNoise * 25
generation_algorithm.step5: Apply dark spots at multiple pattern coordinates (subtract deltas for stone shadows)
generation_algorithm.step6: Apply light specks at pattern coordinates (add deltas for mineral highlights)
generation_algorithm.step7: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Creates natural gravel appearance with scattered stones of varying shades

metadata.created_from: Custom gravel texture design based on Minecraft reference materials
metadata.purpose: Natural gravel block texture with scattered stone appearance

design_notes.inspiration: Based on 16x16 Minecraft gravel textures with gray stone variations
characteristics: Medium gray base color representing typical gravel composition
Multiple pattern layers for realistic stone scatter
Dark spots for individual stones and shadows
Light specks for mineral highlights and weathered surfaces
Higher frequency noise for fine-grained rocky texture
design_notes.visual_goals: Create convincing gravel appearance with natural stone variation and realistic depth
